article.title: Welcome to the U.S. Export Assistance Center of Idaho
article.summary: Learn more about the U.S. Export Assistance Center of Idaho.
article.content:
The U.S. Commercial Service of the U.S. Department of Commerce is a federal government agency dedicated to helping small-to-medium sized Idaho businesses realize their export potential. Our experienced staff of International Trade Specialists will help you:

  • identify and evaluate international partners
  • navigate international documentation challenges
  • create market entry strategies
  • other export related guidance

The U.S. Export Assistance Centers located in Boise is part of an international network of global professionals. We have 165 offices in 82 countries throughout the world. For more information on how we can help your company succeed in the global marketplace, please visitOur Services. To learn first-hand how we can help your company grow internationally, click onTell Us About You.​


​

article.seometadatadescription: Learn more about the U.S. Export Assistance Center of Idaho.
